name.en: The application of functional magnetic resonance imaging in cognitive neuroscience
name.ch: 獨立研究:功能性磁振造影在認知神經科學之應用

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程的目標是幫助學生掌握功能性磁共振成像（FMRI）研究的理論背景和數據分析工具。課程內容強調實驗設計、預處理步驟的理論基礎、統計學以及現有軟體工具的使用。學生需要每週完成作業，並且通過編寫論文獨立地對FMRI數據集進行分析和報告結果。
goal.en: The aim of this course is to help students master the theoretical backgrounds and data-analytical tools for FMRI research. The curriculum emphasizes the experimental design, the rationale of pre-processing steps, the statistics, and the use of available software tools. Students are expected to complete weekly homework and to conduct analyses and report results independently on an FMRI dataset by writing up a manuscript.

flexDiscription.ch: 第17及18兩週將由講師出進階fMRI分析問題讓同學解答，若同學有問題可以與講師約時間討論。
flexDiscription.en: In the 17th and 18th weeks, the instructor will provide advanced fMRI analytic problems for students to solve. If students have questions, they can schedule discussions with the instructor.
